entry.string: If this is your first visit to this part of your Xaraya site, please take a minute to read through the following introduction, in order to explore the different possibilities offered by the Contact module.
"The Messages module gives your users a way to send messages to another users inbox."

"You must be logged into the site before you can send messages. Select Messages from the user menu and select a user from the drop down list to send your message too. Compose your message and select the send button."
"From the Admin menu you can specify the support of short urls for the messages module."
newmessages -> Display's a block that lists any new unread messages for the user with a link to the view messages page.'
